about_the_game:
CrabbleUp Demo is a laid-back, retro-inspired roguelite.

You are a small hermit crab, and you embark on a journey to explore the depth of the seas. Level-up to strengthen your existing abilities, and learn new ones! The skill tree is hidden, the levels are procedurally generated, each playthrough is unique, and enemies hit hard! Can you beat all the bosses, and live to tell the tale?

Demo experience


Please note this is a demo version of CrabbleUp with limited content. You will be able to play through the first chapter, and meet the first boss. Generated content in this chapter will be a bit different from the full game to showcase more in a shorter time. You will meet enemies (in small numbers) which would only appear later in the game.

name: CrabbleUp Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Dive into an oceanic odyssey, where serene exploration meets thrilling challenges. Embark on a journey through endless underwater mazes, armed only with your cunning and defending yourself from perilous foes with the power of your bubbles.
supported_languages: English, German, Spanish - Spain, Hungarian, Japanese, Russian, Simplified Chinese
